ca.gedge.opgraph.util
Class ServiceDiscovery

java.lang.Object
  ca.gedge.opgraph.util.ServiceDiscovery
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultServiceDiscovery
public abstract class ServiceDiscovery
extends Object

A class that provides service discovery facilities. By default, the provider is DefaultServiceDiscovery, which provides discovery facilities similar to that of ServiceLoader, but the service discovery provider can be set by the system property ca.gedge.opgraph.discoveryProvider.
